response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you, valued at $1,500,000. I am offering this unique item to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This exceptional offer is designed to provide you with a chance to secure this valuable asset at a price that represents a significant saving compared to its true worth. I believe that this investment would not only meet but exceed your expectations and contribute greatly to your endeavors. Please let me know if you wish to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
